description: This C source file implements functions related to the creation, deletion, and cloning of service objects within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It defines functions for creating objects either normally or with a specified instance context, deleting objects, and cloning objects, primarily serving within a larger object management framework.

methods.name: SLAP_OBJECT SlapScoStdCreateObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name)
methods.description: Creates a service object within the container based on the specified object name by invoking the CreateObject method on the UOA interface.

methods.name: SLAP_OBJECT SlapScoStdCreateObject2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name,SLAP_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Creates a service object within the container with an additional instance context, using the hInsContext parameter.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapScoStdDeleteObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_OBJECT hSlapObject)
methods.description: Deletes the specified service object from the container by calling the DeleteObject method on the UOA interface.

methods.name: SLAP_OBJECT SlapScoStdCloneObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Clones the current service object within the container by invoking the CreateObject method with the object's name and context.
